Package ohos.agp.window.service

Class WindowManager.LayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.window.service.WindowManager.LayoutConfig
  • Enclosing class:
    WindowManager

    public static class WindowManager.LayoutConfig
extends Object
    Encapsulates the layout attributes, flags, and constants used with a Window.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int alignment
      Indicates the direction of a window.
      float alpha
      Indicates the transparency of the window.
      static int ALTER_ALPHA
      Indicates that the alpha value has changed.
      static int ALTER_DIM
      Indicates that the amount of dimming has changed.
      static int ALTER_FLAGS
      Indicates that the flags have changed.
      static int ALTER_FORMAT
      Indicates that the pixel format has changed.
      static int ALTER_LAYOUT
      Indicates that the layout has changed.
      static int ALTER_TITLE
      Indicates that the title has changed.
      int animations
      The resource id which indicates window animation.
      float dim
      Indicates the brightness of the window.
      static int FIRST_SUB_WINDOW
      1000: Indicates the first sub window.
      static int FIRST_SYSTEM_WINDOW
      2000: Indicates the first system window.
      int flags
      Indicates various flags for a window.
      int height
      Indicates the height of a window.
      static int INPUT_ADJUST_NOTHING
      0x00000018: Do not adjust the input method window; resize or shift the window.
      static int INPUT_ADJUST_PAN
      0x00000010: Shifts the position of the window to show the soft input cursor's focus.
      static int INPUT_ADJUST_RESIZE
      0x00000008: Re-sizes the window to ensure that the input focus is visible.
      static int INPUT_ADJUST_UNSPECIFIED
      0x00: Window-dependent content.
      static int INPUT_IS_FORWARD_NAVIGATION
      0x00000080: The system automatically sets this flag when this window requests focus by the user.
      static int INPUT_MASK_ADJUST
      0x00000078: Adjusts the window to make the soft input area visible.
      static int INPUT_MASK_STATE
      0x15: Confirming the display status of the soft input panel with the window.
      static int INPUT_STATE_ALWAYS_HIDDEN
      0x80000001: When the panel receives the focus, the soft-input-area is hidden.
      static int INPUT_STATE_ALWAYS_VISIBLE
      0x80000002: When the panel receives focus, the soft-input-area is always visible.
      static int INPUT_STATE_HIDDEN
      0x00000001: The soft input panel is invisible when this window requests focus by the user.
      static int INPUT_STATE_UNCHANGED
      0x80000000: The visibility of the soft input panel cannot be changed.
      static int INPUT_STATE_UNSPECIFIED
      0: The soft input panel may be visible or invisible after the window requests focus.
      static int INPUT_STATE_VISIBLE
      0x00000002: While the user navigates forward to the panel, the soft input area is displayed.
      static int LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_ALWAYS
      Indicates that the sidebar is always displayed.
      static int LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_DEFAULT
      Indicates the default display mode of the sidebar.
      static int LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_NEVER
      Indicates that the sidebar is never displayed.
      int layoutInDisplaySideMode
      Indicates the display mode of the sidebar of this window.
      static int MARK_ALLOW_EXTEND_LAYOUT
      0x00000100: The panel can be extended outside the screen.
      static int MARK_ALLOW_LAYOUT_COVER_SCREEN
      0x00000080: Extends the window to cover the full screen, while keeping the decorations around the border (such as the status bar) properly displayed.
      static int MARK_ALLOW_LAYOUT_OVERSCAN
      0x01000000: Indicates the window can content to spread to the over-scanned scope of the screen, if any.
      static int MARK_ALT_FOCUSABLE_IM
      0x00010000: Reverse the way of interaction between the window and the input method.
      static int MARK_DIM_EVE_WINDOW_BEHIND
      0x00000001: Everything after the window gets darker.
      static int MARK_DRAWS_SYSTEM_BAR_BACKGROUNDS
      0x40000000: Draw the system bar's background specially.
      static int MARK_FOCUSABLE_IMPOSSIBLE
      0x00000004: No key input focus for the window.
      static int MARK_FORCE_FULLSCREEN_IMPOSSIBLE
      0x00000400: Forcibly displays the decor areas (such as the navigation bar).
      static int MARK_FULL_SCREEN
      0x00000200: Hides all screen decorations (such as the status bar) when this window is displayed in full-screen mode.
      static int MARK_LAYOUT_ATTACHED_IN_DECOR
      0x20000000: Prevents a window from interferenced by the decor areas, such as the status bar.
      static int MARK_LAYOUT_INSET_DECOR
      0x00008000: Prevents the window content from being covered by screen decorations, such as the status bar.
      static int MARK_LOCAL_FOCUS_MODE
      0x08000000: A window in this mode will only receive events passed using the injectMultimodalEvent(MultimodalEvent) function.
      static int MARK_LOCK_AS_SCREEN_ON
      0x80000000: Allow the lock screen to activate when the screen is on while the user is visible to the window.
      static int MARK_NOT_RESPOD_CHEEK_PRESSES
      0x00004000: No respondence to any event while user put the screen on their faces.
      static int MARK_OUTSIDE_TOUCH
      0x00400000: Allows touch events outside of this window to be sent to other windows that also support multi-touch.
      static int MARK_REMOTE_DEV_INPUT
      1: The input method controller should be started on a remote connected device.
      static int MARK_SCALED
      0x00002000: Allows the window to zoom when it is synthesized to the screen.
      static int MARK_SCREEN_ON_ALWAYS
      0x00000040: Keeps the screen always on as long as this window is visible to the user.
      static int MARK_SECURE
      0x00001000: Prevents the screen from being captured in screenshots or being shown on devices that may contain sensitive information.
      static int MARK_TOUCH_MODAL_IMPOSSIBLE
      0x00000010:This window can receive touch events from the window in front of it, even if the window has focus.
      static int MARK_TOUCHABLE_IMPOSSIBLE
      0x00000008: No touch events for the window.
      static int MARK_TRANSLUCENT_NAVIGATION
      0x04000000: Sets a translucent navigation bar when the window expands to the navigation bar area.
      static int MARK_TRANSLUCENT_STATUS
      0x02000000: Sets a translucent status bar when this window expands to the status bar area.
      static int MARK_WALLPAPER_BEHIND
      0x00080000: Displays the wallpaper into the background of this window.
      static int MARK_WATCH_OUTSIDE_TOUCH
      0x00020000: If LayoutConfig#MARK_TOUCH_MODAL_IMPOSSIBLE has been set, this flag can be used to receive a TouchEvent whose action is outside the window.
      static int MOD_APPLICATION
      2: Indicates the common application window.
      static int MOD_APPLICATION_MEDIA
      A window that displays media, such as video.
      static int MOD_APPLICATION_OVERLAY
      2038: Indicates the application overlay window.
      static int MOD_APPLICATION_PANEL
      1000: Indicates the application panel window (equals to the first sub window).
      static int MOD_INPUT_METHOD
      2011: Indicates input methods window
      static int MOD_KEYGUARD
      Keyguard window.
      static int MOD_PRESENTATION
      2037: Indicates the presentation window displayed on another screen.
      static int MOD_STATUS_BAR
      2000: Indicates the status bar window (equals to the first system window).
      static int MOD_TOAST
      2005: Indicates the toast window.
      int pixelFormat
      Indicates the pixel format of this window.
      String title
      Indicates the title of a window.
      int type
      Indicates the window type.
      int width
      Indicates the width of a window.
      float windowBrightness
      Indicates the window brightness.
      int x
      Indicates the X-coordinate of the window.
      int y
      Indicates the Y-coordinate of the window.

        Constant Field Values

      • MARK_ALT_FOCUSABLE_IM

        public static final int MARK_ALT_FOCUSABLE_IM
        0x00010000: Reverse the way of interaction between the window and the input method.

        That is, if MARK_FOCUSABLE_IMPOSSIBLE is set and this flag is set, then the window will be placed behind or away from the input method; if MARK_FOCUSABLE_IMPOSSIBLE is not set and this flag is set, then the window can be placed on top of the input method as it doesn't need to interact with the input method.

        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Constant Field Values

      • alignment

        public int alignment
        Indicates the direction of a window.
        Since:
        4

      • alpha

        public float alpha
        Indicates the transparency of the window.

        The value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, with 1.0 for completely opaque and 0 .0 for completely transparent.

      • animations

        public int animations
        The resource id which indicates window animation.

      • dim

        public float dim
        Indicates the brightness of the window.

        The value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, with 1.0 for completely opaque and 0 .0 for no dimming.

      • flags

        public int flags
        Indicates various flags for a window.

      • height

        public int height
        Indicates the height of a window.

      • layoutInDisplaySideMode

        public int layoutInDisplaySideMode
        Indicates the display mode of the sidebar of this window. The default value is LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_DEFAULT.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_DEFAULT, LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_ALWAYS, LAYOUT_IN_DISPLAY_SIDE_MODE_NEVER

      • pixelFormat

        public int pixelFormat
        Indicates the pixel format of this window. The default value is Surface.PixelFormat.PIXEL_FORMAT_YCBCR_422_I.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Surface.PixelFormat#PIXEL_FORMAT_YCBCR_422_I, Surface.PixelFormat#PIXEL_FORMAT_YCRCB_420_SP, Surface.PixelFormat#PIXEL_FORMAT_Y

      • title

        public String title
        Indicates the title of a window.
        Since:
        3

      • type

        public int type
        Indicates the window type.

      • width

        public int width
        Indicates the width of a window.

      • windowBrightness

        public float windowBrightness
        Indicates the window brightness.

        The value ranges from 0 to 1. The default value -1 indicates that the brightness is adaptively set.

        Since:
        3

      • x

        public int x
        Indicates the X-coordinate of the window.

      • y

        public int y
        Indicates the Y-coordinate of the window.
